title: Create a Closing Argument Outline
description: An attorney is preparing for trial and needs to create an outline for their closing argument.

tasks.description: Review the key evidence and testimony presented during the trial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the most powerful facts supporting their case.

tasks.description: Structure the closing argument with a compelling theme, an introduction, a summary of the evidence, an attack on the opponent's case, and a conclusion asking the jury for a specific verdict.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a persuasive narrative structure.

tasks.description: Draft the detailed outline with key talking points and references to specific trial exhibits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive outline to be used during the closing argument.
